author: fitz
msg: Add commented out line that will allow us to build the pdf in C5 size
(which I believe is the size that O'Reilly uses for its books).

author: fitz
msg: This patch allows you to create a multi page html version of the
Subversion Book. The book-html-chunk create an 'html-chunk' directory
in book/ to avoid cluttering up your working copy with a gazillon html

author: rooneg
msg: Add cancellation support to 'svn status', 'svn checkout', 'svn update', and
'svn switch'.  Also, fill in the needed code in the command line client to
enable cancellation, but leave out it's actual activation for the time being.
(get_dir_status): take cancellation function and baton arguments, if the
cancel_func is non-null call it to see if we've been cancelled.
(svn_wc_statuses): take cancellation function/baton and pass it in to
(make_editor): correct comment, add cancellation callback and baton
arguments, wrap the editor in a cancellation editor.
svn_wc_get_switch_editor): take cancellation callback/baton arguments, and
the editor in a cancellation editor.
(cancelled, sig_int, check_cancel): new cancellation infrastructure to
allow a user to cancel the running operation with a SIGINT (control-c).
(main): add #if 0'd out code to set up the cancellation function in the
